Allocation module¶

Created on Wed May 2 11:32:35 2018

@author: jpelda

Allocation.alloc_inhabs_to_nodes(gdf_raster, gdf_nodes, graph)[source]¶

Allocates inhabitans to nodes. Nodes in same raster field will get raster’s inhabitans divided by amout of nodes within raster. Raster fields without nodes are allocated to nearest node.

Parameters:
  • gdf_raster (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf[‘SHAPE’]
    • gdf[‘SHAPE_b’]
    • gdf[‘inhabs’]
  • gdf_nodes (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf[‘osmid’], gdf[‘geometry’]
  • graph (nx.Graph()) –
    • edges and nodes from graph of streetnetwork
Returns:

  • list of inhabitants in order of gdf_nodes
Return type:

list(float)
Allocation.alloc_nodes_to_inhabs(gdf_raster, gdf_nodes)[source]¶

Allocates nodes of gdf to fields of gdf_census.

Parameters:
  • gdf_raster (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf_raster[‘inhabs’]: the amount of inhabs per geometry
    • gdf_raster[‘geometry’]: the geometry
  • gdf_nodes (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf_nodes[‘geometry’]: the geometry
Returns:

  • list of inhabitants per node
  • list of raster id
Return type:

list, list
Allocation.alloc_wc_from_b_to_node(gdf_gis_b, gdf_nodes, graph)[source]¶

Allocates the water consumption of each building in GIS-Data to nearest node of graph.

Parameters:
  • gdf_gis_b (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf_gis_b[‘geometry’]: the geometry
    • gdf_gis_b[‘wc’]: the water consumption
    • gdf_gis_b[‘area’]: the area of the building
  • graph (nx.Graph()) –
    • edges and nodes from graph of streetnetwork
Returns:

list of water consumption of each node in order of gdf_nodes
Return type:

list(float)
Allocation.alloc_wc_to_type(gis_cat, gdf_gis_b)[source]¶

Allocates water consumption to types coming from gis_buildings.

Parameters:
  • gis_cat (pandas.DataFrame()) –
    • gis_cat[‘type’]: type of GIS-data
    • gis_cat[‘cat’]: category type belongs to
  • gdf_gis_b (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) –
    • gdf_gis_b[‘types’]: type of building
Returns:

the water consumption for each building in gdf_gis_b
Return type:

[float]

Switch minor tick labeling on or off.

Parameters:
  • labelOnlyBase (bool) – If True, label ticks only at integer powers of base.
